definitions.definition: a piece of planned work or an activity that is finished over a period of time and intended to achieve a particular purpose:
a study of a particular subject done over a period of time, especially by students:
examples: He's doing a class project on pollution.

definitions.definition: to calculate an amount or number expected in the future from information already known:
examples: [ + to infinitive ] Government spending is projected to rise by three percent next year.
